title: Chengdu Urban Retreat in Modern Wenjiang District
description: At the gateway to the Sichuan capital, Crowne Plaza Chengdu Wenjiang, an IHG Hotel, is a cosmopolitan retreat positioned just moments from iconic sightseeing opportunities. Awaken refreshed and renewed in elegant guest rooms before revitalising body and mind at the fitness centre or plunging into the onsite pool. Savour authentic Sichuan cuisine at Cai Feng Lou Chinese Restaurant or venture out for an authentic taste of this vibrant city.
offer_address: No. 619A North Phoenix Street, Wenjiang District, Chengdu, Sichuan 611130, China
